articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: SoftBank-backed Swiggy's shares soar 15% on India market debut after stellar IPO - CNBC
articles.description: The company's IPO, the country's second-largest this year, was reportedly oversubscribed more than three times.
articles.content:
Shares of Indian food delivery giant Swiggy soared 15% on their trading debut Wednesday after a stellar IPO the country's second-largest this year.
The company, which is backed by SoftBank, raised 1… [+2841 chars]
